Some of the new features to be included in [[Windows 7]] include advancements in touch, [[speech recognition|speech]], and [[handwriting recognition]], support for virtual hard disks, support for additional [[file format]]s, improved performance on [[multi-core]] processors,{{Fact|date=December 2008}} improved [[booting|boot]] performance, and [[kernel (computer science)|kernel]] improvements.
Some of the new features to be included in [[Windows 7]] include advancements in touch, [[speech recognition|speech]], and [[handwriting recognition]], support for virtual hard disks, support for additional [[file format]]s, improved performance on [[multi-core]] processors,{{Fact|date=December 2008}} improved [[booting|boot]] performance, and [[kernel (computer science)|kernel]] improvements.
